# CyberUI 2045

> A cyberpunk-themed React UI library with neon-styled components and futuristic aesthetics.

## Summary
CyberUI 2045 is a React component library built with Tailwind CSS v4. It provides a set of pre-styled, responsive, and accessible components designed for "Cyberpunk" or "Sci-Fi" interfaces. Key features include neon glows, glassmorphism, and CRT effects.

## Documentation
- **Agent Guide**: [AGENT.md](https://github.com/patrickkuei/CyberUI/blob/main/AGENT.md) - Best practices for AI agents.
- **Storybook**: [Live Demo](https://patrickkuei.github.io/CyberUI/storybook) - Interactive component explorer.
- **Repository**: [GitHub](https://github.com/patrickkuei/CyberUI) - Source code and issues.

## Installation
```bash
npm install cyberui-2045
```

## Key Components
- `Button`: Neon-styled action button.
- `Card`: Glassmorphism container.
- `Input`: Glowing text input.
- `Modal`: CRT-style dialog.
- `Notification`: Toast system.

## Usage Example
```tsx
import { Button, Card } from "cyberui-2045";
import "cyberui-2045/styles.css";

export const App = () => (
  <Card>
    <h1>Welcome to 2045</h1>
    <Button variant="primary">ENTER SYSTEM</Button>
  </Card>
);
```
